hero.name: Prithika Sathish
hero.tagline: Building products at the intersection of full-stack engineering, AI/ML, and data-driven solutions.

details: Worked across Agile SDLC (requirement gathering → deployment).
Built REST APIs with CSV export for structured, downloadable data access.
Optimized search/filter algorithms for <200 ms response on datasets >1,000 records.
Applied DB indexing and load optimization for high availability.

projects.name: Chakra Markets – Retail Trading Intelligence Suite
projects.description: Real-time analytics platform with portfolio insights, goal-based allocation, and strategy payoff graphs using live NSE and Yahoo Finance APIs.

projects.name: E-Waste Collector
projects.description: Gamified e-waste collection platform with YOLOv8 detection, QR tagging, and NGO collaboration for impact tracking.

projects.name: HerHaven – Women Wellness Platform
projects.description: Platform for scheme discovery, financial literacy, job discovery, and SOS safety features with location tracking.

projects.name: JobVerse – Job Simulation & Preparation
projects.description: Interactive platform with role simulations, AI-driven guidance, resume parsing, and skill-tracking workflows via n8n + Gemini API.

achievements: Winner – Build to Deploy (Mar 2025): 1st place / 100+ teams (ML model in 12 hrs).
Winner – Hack Horizon (Oct 2024): 1st place / 80+ teams (real-time solution).
Winner – Vertex Innovate (Feb 2025): 1st place / 1000+ participants in software domain.
certifications: Complete AI, ML & Data Science Bootcamp – Udemy
